amendment.description: Amendment allows the National Science Foundation to support the creation of K-12 science curriculum, informal education materials, exhibits, and multi-media relevant to global warming, climate science, and greenhouse reduction strategies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new subsection at the end of section 3 with respect to global warming education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Honda amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 165 (Roll no. 288).
